channel.title: Report on Dynamic Simulation Environment
channel.description: Recent content in Report on Dynamic Simulation Environment

item.title: Graph - Report Appliance
item.description: Synopsis Containerized report appliance that runs the installed reports on specified simulation package. # Run the reports. $ dse-report examples/graph/<sim_name>/<simulation_status> Simulation Setup Structure The structure of a simulation follows the format examples/graph/<sim_name>/<simulation_status> # where simulation_status is sim_good or sim_with_error. The graph-report command will run all installed reports on the specified simulation package. Simulation Layout examples/ └── graph/ └── duplicate_writes/ ├── sim_good/ │ ├── data/ │ │ └── simulation.yaml │ └── model/ │ ├── input/ │ │ └── data/ │ │ ├── model.
